data.title: List of GRN for which invoices is pending

qas.question: Hi Experts We have following clearing GL accounts: 1. GR / IR Clearing Account 2. Freight Clearing Account These Accounts get credited when we do goods receipt with TCode MIGO. When we do invoice verification then above two accounts get debited. Hence the balance should be zero for both the above GL accounts. Same way with CENVAT Clearing GL Account. When I do part 2 posting in J1IEX, CENVAT Clearing Account gets credited. When I do MIRO, it gets debited. Hence for CENVAT Clearing Account also, balance should be zero. But in my case, there is credit balances in all the three above GL accounts. Now I want to know for which GRNs, we have not received the invoices because of which balance is there in above three GL accounts. Note: I kept sort key as '010' in GL master for all the above three clearing accounts. But PO number is getting populated in assignment field only for GR / IR Clearing Account (and not Frieght Clearing and CENVAT Clearing GL Account). I just want to know list of GRNs for which invoices are pending. I do not want to post any clearing entry. I tried with F.13, its running only for GR/IR Clearing Account. Its not running for Freight Clearing and CENVAT Clearing Account. (Reason might be that PO number is not getting populated in Assignment field). Please help me, how do i meet my requirement. -- Deepak

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: SUM and HUM which no had the priority

qas.question: Hi all , i am using the HUM functionality for the reciepts , is this functionlaity is does the syste generates SUM during TO , if so which the priority and how this is managed , can some one help me on this . thanks , ksr

answers.text: Hi, not sure what you mean, but maybe this information can help you further: it is possible to use handling unit management together with warehouse management. You activate handling unit management independent from storage unit management. Only in case if storage location is full-WM- AND HU-managed, the storage unit management is always active and HU numbers are taken over as SU numbers. In all other cases HUM and SUM are independent from each other and number ranges must be set a way that they are not overlapping. Regards, Ely

data.title: How to stop A/R Invoice from adding which is without Item Price entered in it.

qas.question: I am a beginner to SAP B1. A/R Invoice is getting added into the system without the item price. I want to that " If item price is not entered in the document, then the A/R Invoice should not get added ". I believe, it can be done through formatted search, But, can anybody help me regarding Query to be used in formatted search OR Is there any other way of achieving this ?

answers.text: Hi Nikhil., Try to automate price through price list and system also giving warning message but still if you want to block use below Stored Procedure. If @object_type='13' AND @transaction_type IN ('A','U') BEGINDeclare @ERRORMESSAGE nvarchar(150)SET @ERRORMESSAGE = NULLSET @ERRORMESSAGE = (SELECT 'Price should not be empty for the line >>' + cast(Max(h.LineNum) + 1 as CHAR(10))FROM INV1 HWHERE H.DOCENTRY = @list_of_cols_val_tab_deland Isnull(h.Price,0) = 0 ) IF ISNULL(@ERRORMESSAGE,'')<>''BEGINSET @error= -1111SET @error_message =N'' + @ERRORMESSAGEENDEND

data.title: How to revaluate Asset,which is already depreciated??

qas.question: Hi Sap Experts, Wishes for the day and for coming New Yr-2009 in Advance. I capitalized an asset on 09/04/2007 and dep.calculated on it @4.75% .the asset value date is 01/04/2007 and APC of asset is 85000.Here Dep. per is Rs.4037.50. Book value FI.Year start :81050.75 Current Book Value is :77013.25(81050.75-4037.50) It means Dep.is already calculated upto 31.03.2009. But on 20/12/2008 i got back Rs.5000 on claim of sales tax return from Govt. My client wants to Deduct that Rs.5000 from the APC of the asset and recalculate Dep.on Rs.80000(85000-5000).so that the Dep. per yr shud be Rs.3800(80000*4.75%) and Book value FI.Yr start :76283.06 Current Book Value is :72483.06(76283.06-3800) PROBLEM: 1)Fi.yr 2007 is closed and it cannot be Reopen. 2)If i try it by ABZU(write-up) its not happening and throwing Error message:Fi is not open to post. 3)What Shud be the Transaction type? 4)And Finally Under ABZU or wht ever transaction code u ll refer me,there is one field "POSTED AMOUNT" Which amount i should enter in that field. Plz guide me to solve this problem. Regards, Biswa Edited by: biswa ranjan on Dec 30, 2008 9:09 AM Edited by: biswa ranjan on Jan 5, 2009 10:02 AM

answers.text: 2)If i try it by ABZU(write-up) its not happening and throwing Error message:Fi is not open to post It is only possible to use a posting date in a open FI posting period.

For this, i need to create own routine in VOFM (with the help of ABAPer) and assign this to theBILLING DOCUMENT TYPE ---> COPYING REQUIREMENTS We use Billing Doc type F1 - For Invoice creation, Billing doc type S1- for Cancellation. (As we all know that in bill doc type F1- under cancellation - Cancel billing doc type - we assign S1) My question is to which billing doc type i need to attach the newly created routine in copying requirement field. Is it on Billing doc typeF1- Invoice or Cancellation billing doc - S1. Thanks Mahe

answers.text: Hi In VOFA - Billing: Doc Type - F1 -( Invoice ) - In this document under Cancellation - Copying requirement you need to attach the newly created Routine .

data.title: Which component to modify in ESS 603

qas.question: Hi all, We are upgrading our ESS applications to ESS 603 EHP4.On the DCs I see two applications and two components for VcDetail and VcReview.One with VcPerAddressUS and the other is VcPerAddressUS_13.We have some customizations to be made in the Detail view.But I am not sure which one to modify.I have several questions here: 1. Which application(Per_Address_US or Per_Address_US_13) should be deployed? 2. Why is there two applications and two Vc components in one DC? 3. Is there any significance to number 13 wrt ESS 603? Thanks a lot Kukku

answers.text: - 13 refers to the code changes in Ehp3 - there were no further code changes in the ESS Address services after EhP3; - In your case, you have to apply the custom changes in VcPerAddressUS_13; - you deploy the DC & not the application & when you run the application, the related code in the DC gets executed; ~Suresh

data.title: which infotype of E -recruitment is the position details stored

qas.question: Hi all, In E recruitment in the requisition the organization data tab page we need to know where the position details and the organization unit details are stored.I mean to ask which infotype of E rec. Thanks and best regards Rajeev

answers.text: Hello Rajeev, if you assign a position to a requisition in the first subtab of the organizational data container sequence item you won't find information in any of the e-recruiting infotypes. The system creates relations between the requisition (NB) and the positions (S) and stores them in HRP1001. They can be accessed throug the standard HR function modules or throug the e-recruiting classes e.g. CL_HRRCF_OI_BL. The Organizational unit (O) and the Job (C) also read from the relations in table HRP1001. If you only assign an organizational unit and job by filling the second subtab of the container sequence item. e-recruiting stores the Ids of the 2 objects in HRP5125 or HRP5126 (currently have no system to look for it). Names / Texts for all these objects are stored like for all OM objects in HRP1000 and can also be accessed via the e-recruiting classes or through the OM function modules. Hope that answers your question. Best regards Roman Weise

data.title: Tracking deleted reservations which have been fulfilled through PO

qas.question: Hi, There's a requirement to trace reservations which are deleted but PO has been raised to fulfill it. Sample scenario: 1. A reservation for 10 units of Material Z is raised 2. MRP run is executed 3. PR is generated to fulfill the 10 units for reservation and 5 units for replenishment. Total of 15 4. PO is raised for 15 units of Material Z 5. The reservation created in step 1 is deleted In this scenario, we will have excess of 10 units. How can we trace back to the reservation that caused this excess stock? We've checked the RESB tables but there are no traces of the reservation back to the PR or PO. Also, reservation change logs are not stored in SAP. How can we trace this? Thanks.

answers.text: Hello, we had a similar issue. I had to use customer exit EXIT_SAPMM07R_001 to call a function I wrote to add the change history records. You also need to create a change document object (http://help.sap.com/saphelp_nw04/helpdata/en/2a/fa018f493111d182b70000e829fbfe/content.htm). http://help.sap.com/saphelp_nw04/helpdata/en/2a/fa018f493111d182b70000e829fbfe/content.htm Regards, John

data.title: GR end date and GR end time new fields in ECC 6.0 which considers time difference of receiving plant

qas.question: Hi Team, Hi Team, We have came accross one issue which shifts delivery date by one day depending on time difference between sending and recieving plant in inter company STO. We have came accross one issue which shifts delivery date by one day depending on time difference between sending and recieving plant in inter company STO. Previosuly in ECC 5.0 there were no GR end date and GR end time fields present at item lveel (delivery schedule tab) of STO. Previosuly in ECC 5.0 there were no GR end date and GR end time fields present at item lveel (delivery schedule tab) of STO. Now in ECC 6.0 this fields are added. Now in ECC 6.0 this fields are added. Could you please let me know if this is added functionality in ECC 6.0. Could you please let me know if this is added functionality in ECC 6.0. Also due to this functionality we are facing issue of delivery date. Also due to this functionality we are facing issue of delivery date. Exmaple in delivery schedule line Exmaple in delivery schedule line GI date 03.01.2013 time 23:59 GI date 03.01.2013 time 23:59 and if transit time is one day as per route then delivery date should be 04.01.2013 time 23:59. and if transit time is one day as per route then delivery date should be 04.01.2013 time 23:59. But if there is time difference of one hour between receiving plant and sending plant then this delivery date gets shifted by one day since GR end time gets increased by one hour But if there is time difference of one hour between receiving plant and sending plant then this delivery date gets shifted by one day since GR end time gets increased by one hour Delivery date will become 05.01.2013 and GR end date 05.01.2013 and GR end time 00:59. Delivery date will become 05.01.2013 and GR end date 05.01.2013 and GR end time 00:59. This only happens in ECC 6.0 and was not present in ECC 5.0. This only happens in ECC 6.0 and was not present in ECC 5.0. Kindly let us know if this is added functionality in ECC 6.0 and also notes present for this enhacement. Kindly let us know if this is added functionality in ECC 6.0 and also notes present for this enhacement. Can we supress this field to exclude this time difference factor. Can we supress this field to exclude this time difference factor. Thanks in advance, Thanks in advance, Regards, Regards, Vaibhav Gandfhi Vaibhav Gandfhi

answers.text: We get the same issue during implementation in other country and checked our settings and contacted BASIS team. Basis team will check any sync issues between OS of different client servers and fix this issue. You can also check OSS. Note 481835 - Analyzing the time zone settings Note 481835 - Analyzing the time zone settings Note 198411 - Current data and information about time zones Note 198411 - Current data and information about time zones

data.title: Which can be left "not configured"?

qas.question: When implementing SD module, which of the ff is optional? I mean which can be left "not configured"? 1. Business Structure 2. Partner Determination 3. Text Determination 4. Output Determination 5. Pricing 6. Tax Determination 7. Availability Check and Transfer of Requirements 8. Copy Control 9. Customizing Sales Documents 10. Shipping and Transportation 11. Billing 12. Account Assignment and Revenue Recognition 13. Credit Management 14. Material Determination, Listing, Exclusion, and Proposal

answers.text: Hello, All these are important if you want to configure the business accordingly. 1. Business Structure (Mandatory) 2. Partner Determination (Mandatory) 3. Text Determination (not mandatory but good to have if the business requires it) 4. Output Determination (Mandatory) 5. Pricing (Mandatory) 6. Tax Determination (Mandatory) 7. Availability Check and Transfer of Requirements (Mandatory) 8. Copy Control (Mandatory) 9. Customizing Sales Documents (Mandatory - Almost all the companies requires it) 10. Shipping and Transportation (Mandatory) 11. Billing (Mandatory) 12. Account Assignment (Mandatory) and Revenue Recognition (not Mandatory) 13. Credit Management (Mandatory) 14. Material Determination, Listing, Exclusion, and Proposal (not mandatory) But all these priorities changes as per business requirement. Regards, SAM

data.title: Which is the best way to assign cost center to cost element?

qas.question: Hi, I am getting the below error... 569400- Gain/Loss Inventory Transfer account requires Cost Object Assignment which is best practice to assign cost center - either assign in KA02 or assign in OKB9-automatic account assignment? Please advise ... Thanks Kishore

answers.text: HI, assignment in KA02 is valid for the whole controlling area, assignment in OKB9 can be different on comp. code level (maybe thats an andvantage for you). Substitution (OKC9) is also possible and delivers more opportunities than OKB9. Best regards, Christian

data.title: link between the overhead calculated and the material against which this overheard was calculated

qas.question: Hello All, I have a development requirement wherein the user wants us to develop a Z report based on CK11n product costing item list. In the z report the user wants a detailed list wherein in one column the overhead calculated must be displayed and in the next column the particular material which was considered as a base for the overhead calculation. If there is same material but with different origin group (againstwhich the overhead was calculated ), report must shows it in the next row. Is there any table / function module etc which shows the link between the overhead calculated and the material against which this overheardwas calculated, especially differentiating same material but with different origin group. Thanks, Aju Abraham

answers.text: I think You can use these tables to able to design a Abap report. TKZUTR and other TKZU.... tables for Overhead KEKO- Product Costing header Data like Valid dates, Lot size etc KEPH-Product Costing: Cost Components for Cost of Goods Mfd MBEW- Material Valuation I hope it helps Best Regards Hrusikesh

data.title: Which is Current HOT submodule of SAP HR/HCM ?

qas.question: Please Guide I wish to turn my career towords the hotest submodule of SAP HR/HCM which one will u suggest me?

answers.text: Dear, Instead of looking for the hottest, would be better to look at the strongest..... As you already might be knowing Payroll and Time are critical in HR. Regards Team Member.

data.title: How to define number range which starts from initial a,b,c for different order types?

qas.question: Dear All, My client wants number range which starts from initial a, b, c, etc. for different order types e.g. PP01, PP03, ZP15 etc. Means for "ZP15" it will be "a12345" likewise. My question is, Can it possible to do? and How can I achieve this? Please guide me. It's an urgent requirement. Thanks, Naresh

answers.text: Hi Naresh, Standard SAP will allow you to maintain only numeric number range. What you can do is maintain 000001 - 999999 in CO82 and then look for some user exit for number range in which you can write abap code. PPCO0006 Enhancement to specify defaults for fields in order header PPCO0007 Exit when saving production order check & revert TnX

data.title: Changes in Delivery doc effect in which table

qas.question: Hi all, iam chaneing the deliveryquantity in delivery order, that changes iun which table that will be stored. i know likp,lips this tables are stored the delivery details. but i want in which table that delivery doc effect will be stored. pls help me regards, dhanush

answers.text: Hi dhanush Apart fromLIPS, LIKPtables check inVEPOtable where the delivery item (POSNR) is stored LIPS, LIKP VEPO Regards Srinath
